name: Strange Shack
description:
What is this?

This is my little project on making a game that's more story driven. It's about a shack that houses strange creatures and the entire existence of it doesn't make sense. 

What's the premise of the game?

You woke up in the middle of the desert and seek shelter at a shack. But the shack is more than it leads on. It houses many different creatures and it's existence doesn't make sense.

The game is really short, why?

It's more of a short project but it having enough substance to get someone's attention. I will probably come back to this at a later date.
